transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, wo abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha kare ya kuch samay pash.

Hello
Customer: Aap jis vyakti

Hello
Customer: ha ji sir
Executive: Ji Deepak ji good morning Pankaj baat kar raha hun India Mart head office se Mohit ka manager baat kar raha hun aapne jo ek complaint dala tha by leads ko lekar ke mera aapse halaki discussion ho gaya hai us pure process ko lekar ke lekin aapse fir dobara se janna chahunga jo aapne recent by leads ka bataya tha aur maine aapko jo solution bataya usme ki search lead pe ja kar ke apna category wise aur location wise hai na wo karna hai to sir aapka jo concern tha fiber glass ya fiber se related inquiry aa raha hai aapko statues ka wo by lead preferences option pe ja kar ke aapko remove kar dena hai jo bhi relevant category aapko lagega ki main nahi karta usme deal aap exclude kar sakte hain theek hai iske alava aapko abhi thoda sa samay lagega sir ki aap software usko samajh sake kis tarike ke product ka aapko requirement rehta hai taki aapko recommendation mein hum show karwaye wo aapka exact requirement jo bhi aapko chahiye na usme marble statue se related aur jo bhi jo bhi locations hai aap jaise jaise aap consume karenge un locations pe software mera automatically add karega wo aapke preferred location add karega aur wahin se aapko recommendation karega leads ka ya customer ko recommend karega aapki company halaki competitors aur competition hai is product line mein aapko thoda samay lagega business generate karne mein to wo patience hame rakhna padega sir itna hai na
Customer: ji sir ji ji
Executive: Iske alava aapko kuch aur bhi fir bhi doubt hai ya kuch aur questions hai aapke to mere se kariye sir aap
Customer: Nahi nahi sir
Executive: Kuch bhi ho raha hai waise to Mohit se aapka kal hua hai detail mein discussion is bare mein unhone proper guide kiya hai ki kis tarike se ratings reviews rating reviews bataya unhone aapko Mohit ne kis tarike se starting se aapko rating reviews ka bhi link share karna hai after quotation share jab bhi aap karte ho uske baad hai na usse bhi ek impact matlab hame better response milta hai customer se jaise jaise hamara rating reviews increase karega na customer se to customer hame samne se response karna start karta hai aur rating reviews ka ho gaya by leads ka discussion ho gaya aap se filter wagera ho gaye by lead preferences ho gaya ki aap source se location aur categories jo unwanted location categories remove kar sakte hain preferred wali rahegi wo software khud se add kar lega hai na aur in future aapko fir bhi kuch bhi problem issue hota hai to aapke pass mera number save hai sir aapne aap kar lijiye nahi to on call aap mera number bhi save kar lijiye
Customer: kar lijiye sir
Executive: hai na wo number mera hai mera number bhi aap save kar lijiye otherwise Mohit ka number aapke pass mein wo aapka account manager aapko kabhi bhi lage ki Mohit us problem ko resolve nahi kar pa raha hai ya fir aap further discussion ya escalate karna chah rahe hain to aap Mohit ko bol dijiyega ki Pankaj se baat karwa de wo mere se baat karwa dega aapki theek hai aur aap se koi bhi miscommitment to nahi kiya gaya sir sales ke time pe ki aisa hoga ya itna business milega kyuki sir dekhiye is product line mein competitors hai to hai na hame inquiries to aati hai wo kam hai aur competitors jyada hai to immediately sold out ho jata hai to wahi reason hai ki aapko ek dam se recent by lead wo sold out bhi dikhati kai baar ji to usme lekin aap category wise aise search karte rahenge na din mein teen ya char bar aapko search karna hai man lijiye 11 11:30 ke kareeb aapne search kar liya har category location dal ke ek bar aapne afternoon time mein search kar liya aur ek bar aapne evening time mein search karna hai kyuki din mein malum hai aapko kitni lead consume karni hai aapko ek per day do se teen kar lijiye sir do se teen karni hai kyuki weekly basis pe 17 mil rahi hai daily bonus one aur aapko jo weekly hai wo 10 milegi sunday sunday to saturday tak rahegi weekly wali aur daily bonus daily aapko consume karni hai otherwise wo lapse ho jayegi to aaj jaise saturday hai aapke pass jitna bhi leads hoga hai na to aap try kijiyega weekly leads aap consume kar paye kyuki kal aapko morning mein dobara se weekly leads credit ho jani hai aur categories aap baat kar sakte ho Mohit ko ki agar kuch aur bhi aapke products hai ya categories hai ya images hai aap add karwana chah rahe hain wo add karwa sakte hain halaki maine dekha hai aapka 22 categories aapki already yahan pe listed hai hamare pass mein usme ek ek do do products teen teen products aapne kiye diye hue hain aur agar aap kuch aur bhi images add karwana chahte hain aapke pass koi hai kuch aur images to aap Mohit se baat karke ya fir aap khud se bhi add kar sakte hain ya Mohit ko bhi bol sakte hain help karega aapko kis tarike se add karna hai wo bhi add kar dega kyuki jitna jyada hamara products registered hoga na sir hamare catalog mein utna chances hai ki customer ka search mere catalog ke us pe mil gaya match ho gaya aur mere ko customer directly inquiry ya call kar sakta hai nahi wo to karunga sir main aur catalog abhi to filhal hai nahi sir demo ho gaya demo demo wagera de diya tha na unhone software use karne ka properly system se bhi mobile se bhi kaise aur aap use isko mobile se kar rahe hain system se karte hain sir sir mobile se bhi aur system dono se karta hu dono se karte hain na to ha dono pe hi aapke pass option rahenge otherwise aap jab products update karenge na to try kijiyega ki system ke through kijiyega kyuki aapko catalogs ko pura uska visibility dikhta hai kaisa photo lag raha hai kya isme missing hai specification description pricing hai na wo aap usse karega otherwise by lead wagera aap rating ka link wagera share jo karenge wo mobile se bhi kar sakte hain rewards wagera jo customer ko lead manager ke through karenge theek hai aur fir bhi kuch bhi problem issue kuch aata hai to aap mere ko connect kar lijiyega abhi jo aapne concern raise kiya tha isko close kar sakta hun sir main ji sir ji sir theek hai aapke pass ek mail aayega please us pe satisfied mark kar lijiyega sir theek hai ye concern close hone ke baad aapke pass mail jayega us pe satisfied mark kar lijiyega ji okay Deepak ji thank you sir thank you so much for your time sir thank you sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was receiving irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter buyleads.

- Executive explained how to add products/categories.

- Executive explained how to use ratings/reviews.

- Executive explained weekly and daily bonus leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark satisfied on received email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filters, ratings, reviews
